channel.title: Music – Maro
channel.description: Recent content in Maro on Music

item.title: Maro - start again
item.description:
The weather’s getting warmer
My heart is getting colder
I want you in my bed
My friends they all got lovers
And they all love each other
While i’m here in my bed
So can we start again
And you can call all your friends
You know the night never ends
So let’s just give it a try
So we can try try try
I wanna have it all tonight ight ight
Oh i got this summer feelin vibe vibe vibe
Tryna catch my breath
i’m feeling high high high
It’s been a longtime
Since i have felt alright
Baby lemme make it right(ouh ouh)
And you can call me
Anytime you want me
Anywhere you gon’ be
Cause we go way back
Got me got me hyptonized
Fuckin lost between your eyes
It’s like candy for my mind(candy)
I said you got me got me hyptonized
Lost between your eyes and thighs
ok lets go
So can we start again
And you can call all your friends
You know the night never ends
So let’s just give it a try
So we can try try try
I wanna have it all tonight igh ight
Oh i got this summer feelin vibe vibe vibe
Tryna catch my breath
i’m feeling high high high
